# Title: b-z then 10

This challenge requires a competitor to take the base two value given, convert it to base 3, then base 4, then base 5, and so on, until the competitor gets to base 26, then convert the base26 to decimal to use in an ascii table to get the flag. This one is meant to be realllllly hard. To solve, go through the bottom steps in reverse. 

## Flag:
`byuctf{justin_this_was_for_you}`
# step 1
- ascii -> decimal
- `98 121 117 99 116 102 123 106 117 115 116 105 110 95 116 104 105 115 95 119 97 115 95 102 111 114 95 121 111 117 125`
# step 2
- decimal to base26
- `3K 4H 4D 3L 4C 3O 4J 42 4D 4B 4C 41 46 3H 4C 40 41 4B 3H 4F 3J 4B 3H 3O 47 4A 3H 4H 47 4D 4L`
# Step 3
- base 26 to base 25
- `3N 4L 4H 3O 4G 42 4N 46 4H 4F 4G 45 4A 3K 4G 44 45 4F 3K 4J 3M 4F 3K 42 4B 4E 3K 4L 4B 4H 50`
# Step 4
- base 25 to base 24
- `42 51 4L 43 4K 46 53 4A 4L 4J 4K 49 4E 3N 4K 48 49 4J 3N 4N 41 4J 3N 46 4F 4I 3N 51 4F 4L 55`
# Step 5
- Base 24 to base 23
- `46 56 52 47 51 4A 58 4E 52 50 51 4D 4I 43 51 4C 4D 50 43 54 45 50 43 4A 4J 4M 43 56 4J 52 5A`
# Step 5 
- Base 23 to base 22
- `4A 5B 57 4B 56 4E 5D 4I 57 55 56 4H 50 47 56 4G 4H 55 47 59 49 55 47 4E 51 54 47 5B 51 57 5F`
# Step 6
- Base 22 to base 21
- `4E 5G 5C 4F 5B 4I 5I 51 5C 5A 5B 50 55 4B 5B 4K 50 5A 4B 5E 4D 5A 4B 4I 56 59 4B 5G 56 5C 5K`
# Step 7
- Base 21 to base 20
- `4I 61 5H 4J 5G 52 63 56 5H 5F 5G 55 5A 4F 5G 54 55 5F 4F 5J 4H 5F 4F 52 5B 5E 4F 61 5B 5H 65`
# Step 8
- Base 20 to base 19
- `53 67 63 54 62 57 69 5B 63 61 62 5A 5F 50 62 59 5A 61 50 65 52 61 50 57 5G 60 50 67 5G 63 6B`
# Step 9 
- Base 19 to base 18
- `58 6D 69 59 68 5C 6F 5G 69 67 68 5F 62 55 68 5E 5F 67 55 6B 57 67 55 5C 63 66 55 6D 63 69 6H`
# Step 10
- Base 18 to base 17
- `5D 72 6F 5E 6E 60 74 64 6F 6D 6E 63 68 5A 6E 62 63 6D 5A 70 5C 6D 5A 60 69 6C 5A 72 69 6F 76`
# Step 11 
- Base 17 to base 16
- `62 79 75 63 74 66 7B 6A 75 73 74 69 6E 5F 74 68 69 73 5F 77 61 73 5F 66 6F 72 5F 79 6F 75 7D`
# Step 12
- Base 16 to base 15
- `68 81 7C 69 7B 6C 83 71 7C 7A 7B 70 75 65 7B 6E 70 7A 65 7E 67 7A 65 6C 76 79 65 81 76 7C 85`
# Step 13
- Base 15 to base 14
- `70 89 85 71 84 74 8B 78 85 83 84 77 7C 6B 84 76 77 83 6B 87 6D 83 6B 74 7D 82 6B 89 7D 85 8D`
# Step 14
- Base 14 to base 13
- `77 94 90 78 8C 7B 96 82 90 8B 8C 81 86 74 8C 80 81 8B 74 92 76 8B 74 7B 87 8A 74 94 87 90 98`
# Step 15
- Base 13 to base 12
- `82 A1 99 83 98 86 A3 8A 99 97 98 89 92 7B 98 88 89 97 7B 9B 81 97 7B 86 93 96 7B A1 93 99 A5`
# Step 14
- Base 12 to base 11
- `8A 100 A7 90 A6 93 102 97 A7 A5 A6 96 A0 87 A6 95 96 A5 87 A9 89 A5 87 93 A1 A4 87 100 A1 A7 104`
# Step 15
- Base 11 to base 10
- `98 121 117 99 116 102 123 106 117 115 116 105 110 95 116 104 105 115 95 119 97 115 95 102 111 114 95 121 111 117 125`
# Step 16
- Base 10 to base 9
- `118 144 140 120 138 123 146 127 140 137 138 126 132 115 138 125 126 137 115 142 117 137 115 123 133 136 115 144 133 140 148`
# Step 17
- Base 9 to base 8
- `142 171 165 143 164 146 173 152 165 163 164 151 156 137 164 150 151 163 137 167 141 163 137 146 157 162 137 171 157 165 175`
# Step 18
- Base 8 to base 7
- `200 232 225 201 224 204 234 211 225 223 224 210 215 164 224 206 210 223 164 230 166 223 164 204 216 222 164 232 216 225 236`
# Step 19
- Base 7 to base 6
- `242 321 313 243 312 250 323 254 313 311 312 253 302 235 312 252 253 311 235 315 241 311 235 250 303 310 235 321 303 313 325`
# step 20
- Base 6 to base 5
- `343 441 432 344 431 402 443 411 432 430 431 410 420 340 431 404 410 430 340 434 342 430 340 402 421 424 340 441 421 432 1000`
# Step 21
- Base 5 to base 4
- `1202 1321 1311 1203 1310 1212 1323 1222 1311 1303 1310 1221 1232 1133 1310 1220 1221 1303 1133 1313 1201 1303 1133 1212 1233 1302 1133 1321 1233 1311 1331`
# Step 22
- Base 4 to base 3
- `10122 11111 11100 10200 11022 10210 11120 10221 11100 11021 11022 10220 11002 10112 11022 10212 10220 11021 10112 11102 10121 11021 10112 10210 11010 11020 10112 11111 11010 11100 11122`
# Step 23 **GIVE THIS VALUE TO COMPETITORS**
- Base 3 to base 2
- `1100010 1111001 1110101 1100011 1110100 1100110 1111011 1101010 1110101 1110011 1110100 1101001 1101110 1011111 1110100 1101000 1101001 1110011 1011111 1110111 1100001 1110011 1011111 1100110 1101111 1110010 1011111 1111001 1101111 1110101 1111101`
